featured.title: National Data Index Compliance
featured.subtitle: Ministry of Hajj & Umrah
featured.problem: Ministry lacked unified data infrastructure aligned with national standards
featured.solution: Built centralized data catalog with automated quality monitoring
outcomes: Improved data quality for the Ministry of Hajj and Umrah, supporting a top-tier result in SDAIA’s NDI (Nadhi’) Index.
Developed software to automate the integration of business rules with CDEs, boosting productivity by over 60%.
Integrated 16+ data systems into unified catalog
Applied 1,500+ CDEs for quality compliance
Achieved 80% infrastructure coverage

featured.title: AI Agent for Tender Scoring
featured.subtitle: Etimad Platform Integration
featured.problem: Manual tender review was time-consuming and inconsistent
featured.solution: Developed LLM-powered agent to analyze and score public tenders
outcomes: Automated relevance scoring for public tenders
Reduced manual review effort significantly
Accelerated bid decision-making process

featured.title: Predictive Maintenance Optimization
featured.subtitle: Published Research
featured.problem: Unexpected equipment failures causing costly downtime
featured.solution: Built predictive framework using IIoT sensors and machine learning
outcomes: Improved machine reliability and extended equipment lifespan
Reduced unexpected breakdowns via early warning system
Published in IJACSA (Vol. 15, Issue 4)

featured.title: Operations Cost Optimization
featured.subtitle: Boeing Saudi Arabia
featured.problem: Operational inefficiencies impacting costs and performance
featured.solution: Enhanced simulation tools and conducted process analysis
outcomes: Improved Boeing’s simulation tools for better operational modeling and decision-making.
Presented recommendations to military stakeholders.
Improved operational decision-making processes.

featured.title: Investment Growth Analysis
featured.subtitle: TASI vs Gold Futures (1998–2023)
featured.problem: Lack of long-term comparative analysis for Saudi investors
featured.solution: Analyzed 25-year performance of TASI vs Gold investments
outcomes: Compared SAR 1,000 investment growth over 25 years
Created visualization dashboards for insights
Provided portfolio diversification recommendations

featured.title: TechHub Student Club
featured.subtitle: Majmaah University
featured.problem: Students lacked engaging platform for tech skill development
featured.solution: Built gamified platform and organized university-wide events
